special_text:
[+2]: Until end of turn, Helene Trant becomes a 4/4 Human Warrior creature with hexproof and trample that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to her this turn.
[-2]: Draw two cards.
[-4]: You get an emblem with “Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.”
